description: Here is an easy, springtime recipe that takes no time at all and puts the light flavors of the season right onto your table Cooking time is key: both the asparagus and the eggs must be watched carefully Arrange everything on a plate beautifully, and throw open the windows to spring
title: Asparagus With Mustard Vinaigrette
title_page: Asparagus With Mustard Vinaigrette Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Here is an easy, springtime recipe that takes no time at all and puts the light flavors of the season right onto your table. Cooking time is key: both the asparagus and the eggs must be watched carefully. Arrange everything on a plate beautifully, and throw open the windows to spring.
Featured in: A Romantic Cookâ€™s True Spring Love.
Learn: How to Cook Asparagus
